channel.title: concentric on Erin's Audio Corner
channel.description: Recent content in concentric on Erin's Audio Corner

item.title: Dayton MK602X Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were sent to me by Dayton directly. I sent them back before I had the chance to take photos of my own.

item.title: JBL Stage A130 Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by their owner who had them dropped shipped to me from a retailer.

item.title: Vandersteen Model 2c Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by their owner. This specific model - the Model 2c - was produced from 1980-1989 according to the manufacturer.

item.title: JBL Stage A120 Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by their owner who had them dropped shipped to me from a retailer.

item.title: Perlisten S4b Bookshelf Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by their owner in brand new condition.

item.title: Emotiva Airmotiv B1+ Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by their owner who had them dropped shipped to me from Emotiva.

item.title: Emotiva Airmotiv T2+ Tower Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by Emotiva. They did not see the review before it was published.

item.title: Klipsch Forte IV Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review Note: These speakers were loaned to me by a viewer in brand new in box condition.

item.title: Klipsch Heresy IV Review (Redux!)
